meanings.definition: A group of reptiles characterized by having two holes on each side of the skull.
meanings.sent1: Diapsids are reptiles with two holes on each side of their skull.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study diapsids to learn more about their unique skull structure.
meanings.sent3: The diapsids at the zoo seemed to be chatting with each other through their skull holes.
meanings.sent4: In the world of diapsids, having two skull holes is like having built-in earphones.
meanings.sent5: The diapsids' skull holes make them stand out among other reptiles.

meanings.definition: An order of reptiles that includes lizards, snakes, and crocodiles.
meanings.sent1: Diapsids such as lizards and crocodiles are fascinating creatures to observe.
meanings.sent2: The zookeeper fed the diapsids their favorite treats of insects and fish.
meanings.sent3: The diapsids threw a party in the reptile house, inviting all their scaly friends.
meanings.sent4: In the swamp, the diapsids ruled the waters like ancient guardians.
meanings.sent5: Children marveled at the diapsids' diverse forms and behaviors.
